Title: arc()
Description: Draws an arc.

Title: circle()
Description: Draws a circle.

Title: ellipse()
Description: Draws an ellipse (oval).

Title: line()
Description: Draws a straight line between two points.

Title: point()
Description: Draws a single point in space.

Title: quad()
Description: Draws a quadrilateral (four-sided shape).

Title: rect()
Description: Draws a rectangle.

Title: square()
Description: Draws a square.

Title: triangle()
Description: Draws a triangle.

Title: createModel()
Description: Load a 3d model from an OBJ or STL string.

Title: loadModel()
Description: Loads a 3D model to create a p5.Geometry object.

Title: model()
Description: Draws a p5.Geometry object to the canvas.

Title: beginGeometry()
Description: Begins adding shapes to a new p5.Geometry object.

Title: box()
Description: Draws a box (rectangular prism).

Title: buildGeometry()
Description: Creates a custom p5.Geometry object from simpler 3D shapes.

Title: cone()
Description: Draws a cone.

Title: cylinder()
Description: Draws a cylinder.

Title: ellipsoid()
Description: Draws an ellipsoid.

Title: endGeometry()
Description: Stops adding shapes to a new p5.Geometry object and returns the object.

Title: freeGeometry()
Description: Clears a p5.Geometry object from the graphics processing unit (GPU) memory.

Title: plane()
Description: Draws a plane.

Title: sphere()
Description: Draws a sphere.

Title: torus()
Description: Draws a torus.

Title: ellipseMode()
Description: Changes where ellipses, circles, and arcs are drawn.

Title: noSmooth()
Description: Draws certain features with jagged (aliased) edges.

Title: rectMode()
Description: Changes where rectangles and squares are drawn.

Title: smooth()
Description: Draws certain features with smooth (antialiased) edges.

Title: strokeCap()
Description: Sets the style for rendering the ends of lines.

Title: strokeJoin()
Description: Sets the style of the joints that connect line segments.

Title: strokeWeight()
Description: Sets the width of the stroke used for points, lines, and the outlines of shapes.

Title: bezier()
Description: Draws a Bézier curve.

Title: bezierDetail()
Description: Sets the number of segments used to draw Bézier curves in WebGL mode.

Title: bezierPoint()
Description: Calculates coordinates along a Bézier curve using interpolation.

Title: bezierTangent()
Description: Calculates coordinates along a line that's tangent to a Bézier curve.

Title: curve()
Description: Draws a curve using a Catmull-Rom spline.

Title: curveDetail()
Description: Sets the number of segments used to draw spline curves in WebGL mode.

Title: curvePoint()
Description: Calculates coordinates along a spline curve using interpolation.

Title: curveTangent()
Description: Calculates coordinates along a line that's tangent to a spline curve.

Title: curveTightness()
Description: Adjusts the way curve() and curveVertex() draw.

Title: beginContour()
Description: Begins creating a hole within a flat shape.

Title: beginShape()
Description: Begins adding vertices to a custom shape.

Title: bezierVertex()
Description: Adds a Bézier curve segment to a custom shape.

Title: curveVertex()
Description: Adds a spline curve segment to a custom shape.

Title: endContour()
Description: Stops creating a hole within a flat shape.

Title: endShape()
Description: Stops adding vertices to a custom shape.

Title: normal()
Description: Sets the normal vector for vertices in a custom 3D shape.

Title: quadraticVertex()
Description: Adds a quadratic Bézier curve segment to a custom shape.

Title: vertex()
Description: Adds a vertex to a custom shape.

Title: calculateBoundingBox()
Description: Calculates the position and size of the smallest box that contains the geometry.

Title: clearColors()
Description: Removes the geometry’s internal colors.

Title: computeFaces()
Description: Computes the geometry's faces using its vertices.

Title: computeNormals()
Description: Calculates the normal vector for each vertex on the geometry.

Title: faces
Description: An array that lists which of the geometry's vertices form each of its faces.

Title: flipU()
Description: Flips the geometry’s texture u-coordinates.

Title: flipV()
Description: Flips the geometry’s texture v-coordinates.

Title: normalize()
Description: Transforms the geometry's vertices to fit snugly within a 100×100×100 box centered at the origin.

Title: saveObj()
Description: The saveObj() function exports p5.Geometry objects as 3D models in the Wavefront.obj file format

Title: saveStl()
Description: The saveStl() function exports p5.Geometry objects as 3D models in the STL stereolithography file format

Title: uvs
Description: An array that lists the texture coordinates for each of the geometry's vertices.

Title: vertexNormals
Description: An array with the vectors that are normal to the geometry's vertices.

Title: vertices
Description: An array with the geometry's vertices.

Title: alpha()
Description: Gets the alpha (transparency) value of a color.

Title: blue()
Description: Gets the blue value of a color.

Title: brightness()
Description: Gets the brightness value of a color.

Title: color()
Description: Creates a p5.Color object.

Title: green()
Description: Gets the green value of a color.

Title: hue()
Description: Gets the hue value of a color.

Title: lerpColor()
Description: Blends two colors to find a third color between them.

Title: lightness()
Description: Gets the lightness value of a color.

Title: paletteLerp()
Description: Blends multiple colors to find a color between them.

Title: red()
Description: Gets the red value of a color.

Title: saturation()
Description: Gets the saturation value of a color.

Title: background()
Description: Sets the color used for the background of the canvas.

Title: beginClip()
Description: Starts defining a shape that will mask any shapes drawn afterward.

Title: clear()
Description: Clears the pixels on the canvas.

Title: clip()
Description: Defines a shape that will mask any shapes drawn afterward.

Title: colorMode()
Description: Changes the way color values are interpreted.

Title: endClip()
Description: Ends defining a mask that was started with beginClip().

Title: erase()
Description: Starts using shapes to erase parts of the canvas.

Title: fill()
Description: Sets the color used to fill shapes.

Title: noErase()
Description: Ends erasing that was started with erase().

Title: noFill()
Description: Disables setting the fill color for shapes.

Title: noStroke()
Description: Disables drawing points, lines, and the outlines of shapes.

Title: stroke()
Description: Sets the color used to draw points, lines, and the outlines of shapes.

Title: setAlpha()
Description: Sets the alpha (transparency) value of a color.

Title: setBlue()
Description: Sets the blue component of a color.

Title: setGreen()
Description: Sets the green component of a color.

Title: setRed()
Description: Sets the red component of a color.

Title: toString()
Description: Returns the color formatted as a String.

Title: textAlign()
Description: Sets the way text is aligned when text() is called.

Title: textAscent()
Description: Calculates the ascent of the current font at its current size.

Title: textDescent()
Description: Calculates the descent of the current font at its current size.

Title: textLeading()
Description: Sets the spacing between lines of text when text() is called.

Title: textSize()
Description: Sets the font size when text() is called.

Title: textStyle()
Description: Sets the style for system fonts when text() is called.

Title: textWidth()
Description: Calculates the maximum width of a string of text drawn when text() is called.

Title: textWrap()
Description: Sets the style for wrapping text when text() is called.

Title: loadFont()
Description: Loads a font and creates a p5.Font object

Title: text()
Description: Draws text to the canvas.

Title: textFont()
Description: Sets the font used by the text() function.

Title: font
Description: The font's underlying opentype.js font object.

Title: textBounds()
Description: Returns the bounding box for a string of text written using the font.

Title: textToPoints()
Description: Returns an array of points outlining a string of text written using the font.

Title: createImage()
Description: Creates a new p5.Image object.

Title: saveCanvas()
Description: Saves the current canvas as an image.

Title: saveFrames()
Description: Captures a sequence of frames from the canvas that can be saved as images.

Title: image()
Description: Draws an image to the canvas.

Title: imageMode()
Description: Changes the location from which images are drawn when image() is called.

Title: loadImage()
Description: Loads an image to create a p5.Image object.

Title: noTint()
Description: Removes the current tint set by tint().

Title: saveGif()
Description: Generates a gif from a sketch and saves it to a file.

Title: tint()
Description: Tints images using a color.

Title: blend()
Description: Copies a region of pixels from one image to another.

Title: copy()
Description: Copies pixels from a source image to a region of the canvas.

Title: filter()
Description: Applies an image filter to the canvas.

Title: get()
Description: Gets a pixel or a region of pixels from the canvas.

Title: loadPixels()
Description: Loads the current value of each pixel on the canvas into the pixels array.

Title: pixels
Description: An array containing the color of each pixel on the canvas.

Title: set()
Description: Sets the color of a pixel or draws an image to the canvas.

Title: updatePixels()
Description: Updates the canvas with the RGBA values in the pixels array.

Title: blend()
Description: Copies a region of pixels from another image into this one.

Title: copy()
Description: Copies pixels from a source image to this image.

Title: delay()
Description: Changes the delay between frames in an animated GIF.

Title: filter()
Description: Applies an image filter to the image.

Title: get()
Description: Gets a pixel or a region of pixels from the image.

Title: getCurrentFrame()
Description: Gets the index of the current frame in an animated GIF.

Title: height
Description: The image's height in pixels.

Title: loadPixels()
Description: Loads the current value of each pixel in the image into the img.pixels array.

Title: mask()
Description: Masks part of the image with another.

Title: numFrames()
Description: Returns the number of frames in an animated GIF.

Title: pause()
Description: Pauses an animated GIF.

Title: pixelDensity()
Description: Gets or sets the pixel density for high pixel density displays.

Title: pixels
Description: An array containing the color of each pixel in the image.

Title: play()
Description: Plays an animated GIF that was paused with img.pause().

Title: reset()
Description: Restarts an animated GIF at its first frame.

Title: resize()
Description: Resizes the image to a given width and height.

Title: save()
Description: Saves the image to a file.

Title: set()
Description: Sets the color of one or more pixels within an image.

Title: setFrame()
Description: Sets the current frame in an animated GIF.

Title: updatePixels()
Description: Updates the canvas with the RGBA values in the img.pixels array.

Title: width
Description: The image's width in pixels.

Title: applyMatrix()
Description: Applies a transformation matrix to the coordinate system.

Title: resetMatrix()
Description: Clears all transformations applied to the coordinate system.

Title: rotate()
Description: Rotates the coordinate system.

Title: rotateX()
Description: Rotates the coordinate system about the x-axis in WebGL mode.

Title: rotateY()
Description: Rotates the coordinate system about the y-axis in WebGL mode.

Title: rotateZ()
Description: Rotates the coordinate system about the z-axis in WebGL mode.

Title: scale()
Description: Scales the coordinate system.

Title: shearX()
Description: Shears the x-axis so that shapes appear skewed.

Title: shearY()
Description: Shears the y-axis so that shapes appear skewed.

Title: translate()
Description: Translates the coordinate system.

Title: cursor()
Description: Changes the cursor's appearance.

Title: deltaTime
Description: A Number variable that tracks the number of milliseconds it took to draw the last frame.

Title: describe()
Description: Creates a screen reader-accessible description of the canvas.

Title: describeElement()
Description: Creates a screen reader-accessible description of elements in the canvas.

Title: displayDensity()
Description: Returns the display's current pixel density.

Title: displayHeight
Description: A Number variable that stores the height of the screen display.

Title: displayWidth
Description: A Number variable that stores the width of the screen display.

Title: focused
Description: A Boolean variable that's true if the browser is focused and false if not.

Title: frameCount
Description: A Number variable that tracks the number of frames drawn since the sketch started.

Title: frameRate()
Description: Sets the number of frames to draw per second.

Title: fullscreen()
Description: Toggles full-screen mode or returns the current mode.

Title: getTargetFrameRate()
Description: Returns the target frame rate.

Title: getURL()
Description: Returns the sketch's current URL as a String.

Title: getURLParams()
Description: Returns the current URL parameters in an Object.

Title: getURLPath()
Description: Returns the current URL path as an Array of Strings.

Title: gridOutput()
Description: Creates a screen reader-accessible description of shapes on the canvas.

Title: height
Description: A Number variable that stores the height of the canvas in pixels.

Title: noCursor()
Description: Hides the cursor from view.

Title: pixelDensity()
Description: Sets the pixel density or returns the current density.

Title: print()
Description: Displays text in the web browser's console.

Title: textOutput()
Description: Creates a screen reader-accessible description of shapes on the canvas.

Title: webglVersion
Description: A String variable with the WebGL version in use.

Title: width
Description: A Number variable that stores the width of the canvas in pixels.

Title: windowHeight
Description: A Number variable that stores the height of the browser's viewport.

Title: windowResized()
Description: A function that's called when the browser window is resized.

Title: windowWidth
Description: A Number variable that stores the width of the browser's viewport.

Title: camera()
Description: Sets the position and orientation of the current camera in a 3D sketch.

Title: createCamera()
Description: Creates a new p5.Camera object and sets it as the current (active) camera.

Title: frustum()
Description: Sets the frustum of the current camera in a 3D sketch.

Title: linePerspective()
Description: Enables or disables perspective for lines in 3D sketches.

Title: ortho()
Description: Sets an orthographic projection for the current camera in a 3D sketch.

Title: perspective()
Description: Sets a perspective projection for the current camera in a 3D sketch.

Title: setCamera()
Description: Sets the current (active) camera of a 3D sketch.

Title: debugMode()
Description: Adds a grid and an axes icon to clarify orientation in 3D sketches.

Title: noDebugMode()
Description: Turns off debugMode() in a 3D sketch.

Title: orbitControl()
Description: Allows the user to orbit around a 3D sketch using a mouse, trackpad, or touchscreen.

Title: ambientLight()
Description: Creates a light that shines from all directions.

Title: directionalLight()
Description: Creates a light that shines in one direction.

Title: imageLight()
Description: Creates an ambient light from an image.

Title: lightFalloff()
Description: Sets the falloff rate for pointLight() and spotLight().

Title: lights()
Description: Places an ambient and directional light in the scene

Title: noLights()
Description: Removes all lights from the sketch.

Title: panorama()
Description: Creates an immersive 3D background.

Title: pointLight()
Description: Creates a light that shines from a point in all directions.

Title: specularColor()
Description: Sets the specular color for lights.

Title: spotLight()
Description: Creates a light that shines from a point in one direction.

Title: ambientMaterial()
Description: Sets the ambient color of shapes’ surface material.

Title: baseColorShader()
Description: Get the shader used when no lights or materials are applied.

Title: baseMaterialShader()
Description: Get the default shader used with lights, materials, and textures.

Title: baseNormalShader()
Description: Get the shader used by normalMaterial().

Title: baseStrokeShader()
Description: Get the shader used when drawing the strokes of shapes.

Title: createFilterShader()
Description: Creates a p5.Shader object to be used with the filter() function.

Title: createShader()
Description: Creates a new p5.Shader object.

Title: emissiveMaterial()
Description: Sets the emissive color of shapes’ surface material.

Title: loadShader()
Description: Loads vertex and fragment shaders to create a p5.Shader object.

Title: metalness()
Description: Sets the amount of "metalness" of a specularMaterial().

Title: normalMaterial()
Description: Sets the current material as a normal material.

Title: resetShader()
Description: Restores the default shaders.

Title: shader()
Description: Sets the p5.Shader object to apply while drawing.

Title: shininess()
Description: Sets the amount of gloss ("shininess") of a specularMaterial().

Title: specularMaterial()
Description: Sets the specular color of shapes’ surface material.

Title: texture()
Description: Sets the texture that will be used on shapes.

Title: textureMode()
Description: Changes the coordinate system used for textures when they’re applied to custom shapes.

Title: textureWrap()
Description: Changes the way textures behave when a shape’s uv coordinates go beyond the texture.

Title: camera()
Description: Sets the position and orientation of the camera.

Title: centerX
Description: The x-coordinate of the place where the camera looks.

Title: centerY
Description: The y-coordinate of the place where the camera looks.

Title: centerZ
Description: The y-coordinate of the place where the camera looks.

Title: eyeX
Description: The camera’s x-coordinate.

Title: eyeY
Description: The camera’s y-coordinate.

Title: eyeZ
Description: The camera’s z-coordinate.

Title: frustum()
Description: Sets the camera's frustum.

Title: lookAt()
Description: Points the camera at a location.

Title: move()
Description: Moves the camera along its "local" axes without changing its orientation.

Title: ortho()
Description: Sets an orthographic projection for the camera.

Title: pan()
Description: Rotates the camera left and right.

Title: perspective()
Description: Sets a perspective projection for the camera.

Title: roll()
Description: Rotates the camera in a clockwise/counter-clockwise direction.

Title: set()
Description: Sets the camera’s position, orientation, and projection by copying another camera.

Title: setPosition()
Description: Sets the camera’s position in "world" space without changing its orientation.

Title: slerp()
Description: Sets the camera’s position and orientation to values that are in-between those of two other cameras.

Title: tilt()
Description: Rotates the camera up and down.

Title: upX
Description: The x-component of the camera's "up" vector.

Title: upY
Description: The y-component of the camera's "up" vector.

Title: upZ
Description: The z-component of the camera's "up" vector.

Title: copyToContext()
Description: Copies the shader from one drawing context to another.

Title: inspectHooks()
Description: Logs the hooks available in this shader, and their current implementation.

Title: modify()
Description: Returns a new shader, based on the original, but with custom snippets of shader code replacing default behaviour.

Title: setUniform()
Description: Sets the shader’s uniform (global) variables.

Title: blendMode()
Description: Sets the way colors blend when added to the canvas.

Title: clearDepth()
Description: Clears the depth buffer in WebGL mode.

Title: createCanvas()
Description: Creates a canvas element on the web page.

Title: createFramebuffer()
Description: Creates and a new p5.Framebuffer object.

Title: createGraphics()
Description: Creates a p5.Graphics object.

Title: drawingContext
Description: A system variable that provides direct access to the sketch's <canvas> element.

Title: noCanvas()
Description: Removes the default canvas.

Title: resizeCanvas()
Description: Resizes the canvas to a given width and height.

Title: setAttributes()
Description: Set attributes for the WebGL Drawing context

Title: autoSized()
Description: Toggles the framebuffer's autosizing mode or returns the current mode.

Title: begin()
Description: Begins drawing shapes to the framebuffer.

Title: color
Description: An object that stores the framebuffer's color data.

Title: createCamera()
Description: Creates a new p5.Camera object to use with the framebuffer.

Title: depth
Description: An object that stores the framebuffer's depth data.

Title: draw()
Description: Draws to the framebuffer by calling a function that contains drawing instructions.

Title: end()
Description: Stops drawing shapes to the framebuffer.

Title: get()
Description: Gets a pixel or a region of pixels from the framebuffer.

Title: loadPixels()
Description: Loads the current value of each pixel in the framebuffer into its pixels array.

Description: Sets the framebuffer's pixel density or returns its current density.

Title: pixels
Description: An array containing the color of each pixel in the framebuffer.

Title: remove()

Title: resize()
Description: Resizes the framebuffer to a given width and height.

Title: updatePixels()
Description: Updates the framebuffer with the RGBA values in the pixels array.

Title: createFramebuffer()
Description: Creates a new p5.Framebuffer object with the same WebGL context as the graphics buffer.

Title: remove()
Description: Removes the graphics buffer from the web page.

Title: reset()
Description: Resets the graphics buffer's transformations and lighting.

Title: abs()
Description: Calculates the absolute value of a number.

Title: ceil()
Description: Calculates the closest integer value that is greater than or equal to a number.

Title: constrain()
Description: Constrains a number between a minimum and maximum value.

Title: dist()
Description: Calculates the distance between two points.

Title: exp()
Description: Calculates the value of Euler's number e (2.71828...) raised to the power of a number.

Title: floor()
Description: Calculates the closest integer value that is less than or equal to the value of a number.

Title: fract()
Description: Calculates the fractional part of a number.

Title: lerp()
Description: Calculates a number between two numbers at a specific increment.

Title: log()
Description: Calculates the natural logarithm (the base-e logarithm) of a number.

Title: mag()
Description: Calculates the magnitude, or length, of a vector.

Title: map()
Description: Re-maps a number from one range to another.

Title: max()
Description: Returns the largest value in a sequence of numbers.

Title: min()
Description: Returns the smallest value in a sequence of numbers.

Title: norm()
Description: Maps a number from one range to a value between 0 and 1.

Title: pow()
Description: Calculates exponential expressions such as 2^3.

Title: round()
Description: Calculates the integer closest to a number.

Title: sq()
Description: Calculates the square of a number.

Title: sqrt()
Description: Calculates the square root of a number.

Title: noise()
Description: Returns random numbers that can be tuned to feel organic.

Title: noiseDetail()
Description: Adjusts the character of the noise produced by the noise() function.

Title: noiseSeed()
Description: Sets the seed value for the noise() function.

Title: random()
Description: Returns a random number or a random element from an array.

Title: randomGaussian()
Description: Returns a random number fitting a Gaussian, or normal, distribution.

Title: randomSeed()
Description: Sets the seed value for the random() and randomGaussian() functions.

Title: acos()
Description: Calculates the arc cosine of a number.

Title: angleMode()
Description: Changes the unit system used to measure angles.

Title: asin()
Description: Calculates the arc sine of a number.

Title: atan()
Description: Calculates the arc tangent of a number.

Title: atan2()
Description: Calculates the angle formed by a point, the origin, and the positive x-axis.

Title: cos()
Description: Calculates the cosine of an angle.

Title: degrees()
Description: Converts an angle measured in radians to its value in degrees.

Title: radians()
Description: Converts an angle measured in degrees to its value in radians.

Title: sin()
Description: Calculates the sine of an angle.

Title: tan()
Description: Calculates the tangent of an angle.

Title: createVector()
Description: Creates a new p5.Vector object.

Title: add()
Description: Adds to a vector's x, y, and z components.

Title: angleBetween()
Description: Calculates the angle between two vectors.

Title: array()
Description: Returns the vector's components as an array of numbers.

Title: copy()
Description: Returns a copy of the p5.Vector object.

Title: cross()
Description: Calculates the cross product of two vectors.

Title: dist()
Description: Calculates the distance between two points represented by vectors.

Title: div()
Description: Divides a vector's x, y, and z components.

Title: dot()
Description: Calculates the dot product of two vectors.

Title: equals()
Description: Checks whether all the vector's components are equal to another vector's.

Title: fromAngle()
Description: Creates a new 2D vector from an angle.

Title: fromAngles()
Description: Creates a new 3D vector from a pair of ISO spherical angles.

Title: heading()

Title: lerp()
Description: Calculates new x, y, and z components that are proportionally the same distance between two vectors.

Title: mag()
Description: Calculates the magnitude (length) of the vector.

Title: setHeading()

Title: setMag()

Title: slerp()

Title: sub()

Title: toString()
Description: Returns a string representation of a vector.

Title: x
Description: The x component of the vector

Title: y
Description: The y component of the vector

Title: z
Description: The z component of the vector

Title: httpDo()
Description: Method for executing an HTTP request

Title: httpGet()
Description: Method for executing an HTTP GET request

Title: httpPost()
Description: Method for executing an HTTP POST request

Title: loadBytes()
Description: This method is suitable for fetching files up to size of 64MB.

Title: loadJSON()
Description: Loads a JSON file to create an Object.

Title: loadStrings()
Description: Loads a text file to create an Array.

Title: loadTable()
Description: Reads the contents of a file or URL and creates a p5.Table object with its values

Title: loadXML()
Description: Loads an XML file to create a p5.XML object.

Title: createWriter()
Description: Creates a new p5.PrintWriter object.

Title: p5.PrintWriter
Description: A class to describe a print stream.

Title: save()
Description: Saves a given element(image, text, json, csv, wav, or html) to the client's computer

Title: saveJSON()
Description: Saves an Object or Array to a JSON file.

Title: saveStrings()
Description: Saves an Array of Strings to a file, one per line.

Title: saveTable()
Description: Writes the contents of a Table object to a file

Title: day()
Description: Returns the current day as a number from 1–31.

Title: hour()
Description: Returns the current hour as a number from 0–23.

Title: millis()
Description: Returns the number of milliseconds since a sketch started running.

Title: minute()
Description: Returns the current minute as a number from 0–59.

Title: month()
Description: Returns the current month as a number from 1–12.

Title: second()
Description: Returns the current second as a number from 0–59.

Title: year()
Description: Returns the current year as a number such as 1999.

Title: addColumn()
Description: Use addColumn() to add a new column to a Table object

Title: addRow()
Description: Use addRow() to add a new row of data to a p5.Table object

Title: clearRows()
Description: Removes all rows from a Table

Title: findRow()
Description: Finds the first row in the Table that contains the value provided, and returns a reference to that row

Title: findRows()
Description: Finds the rows in the Table that contain the value provided, and returns references to those rows

Title: get()
Description: Retrieves a value from the Table's specified row and column

Title: getArray()
Description: Retrieves all table data and returns it as a multidimensional array.

Title: getColumn()
Description: Retrieves all values in the specified column, and returns them as an array

Title: getColumnCount()
Description: Returns the total number of columns in a Table.

Title: getNum()
Description: Retrieves a Float value from the Table's specified row and column

Title: getObject()
Description: Retrieves all table data and returns as an object

Title: getRow()
Description: Returns a reference to the specified p5.TableRow

Title: getRowCount()
Description: Returns the total number of rows in a Table.

Title: getRows()
Description: Gets all rows from the table

Title: getString()
Description: Retrieves a String value from the Table's specified row and column

Title: matchRow()
Description: Finds the first row in the Table that matches the regular expression provided, and returns a reference to that row

Title: matchRows()
Description: Finds the rows in the Table that match the regular expression provided, and returns references to those rows

Title: removeColumn()
Description: Use removeColumn() to remove an existing column from a Table object

Title: removeRow()
Description: Removes a row from the table object.

Title: removeTokens()
Description: Removes any of the specified characters (or "tokens").

Title: rows
Description: An array containing the p5.TableRow objects that make up the rows of the table

Title: set()
Description: Stores a value in the Table's specified row and column

Title: setNum()
Description: Stores a Float value in the Table's specified row and column

Title: setString()
Description: Stores a String value in the Table's specified row and column

Title: trim()
Description: Trims leading and trailing whitespace, such as spaces and tabs, from String table values

Title: get()
Description: Retrieves a value from the TableRow's specified column

Title: getNum()
Description: Retrieves a Float value from the TableRow's specified column

Title: getString()
Description: Retrieves an String value from the TableRow's specified column

Title: set()
Description: Stores a value in the TableRow's specified column

Title: setNum()
Description: Stores a Float value in the TableRow's specified column

Title: setString()
Description: Stores a String value in the TableRow's specified column

Title: addChild()
Description: Adds a new child element and returns a reference to it.

Title: getAttributeCount()
Description: Returns the number of attributes the element has.

Title: getChild()
Description: Returns the first matching child element as a new p5.XML object.

Title: getChildren()
Description: Returns an array with the element's child elements as new p5.XML objects.

Title: getContent()
Description: Returns the element's content as a String.

Title: getName()
Description: Returns the element's name as a String.

Title: getNum()
Description: Return an attribute's value as a Number.

Title: getParent()
Description: Returns the element's parent element as a new p5.XML object.

Title: getString()
Description: Return an attribute's value as a string.

Title: hasAttribute()
Description: Returns true if the element has a given attribute and false if not.

Title: hasChildren()
Description: Returns true if the element has child elements and false if not.

Title: listAttributes()
Description: Returns an Array with the names of the element's attributes.

Title: listChildren()
Description: Returns an array with the names of the element's child elements as Strings.

Title: removeChild()
Description: Removes the first matching child element.

Title: serialize()
Description: Returns the element as a String.

Title: setAttribute()
Description: Sets an attribute to a given value.

Title: setContent()
Description: Sets the element's content.

Title: setName()
Description: Sets the element's tag name.

Title: accelerationX
Description: The system variable accelerationX always contains the acceleration of the device along the x axis

Title: accelerationY
Description: The system variable accelerationY always contains the acceleration of the device along the y axis

Title: accelerationZ
Description: The system variable accelerationZ always contains the acceleration of the device along the z axis

Title: deviceMoved()
Description: The deviceMoved() function is called when the device is moved by more than the threshold value along X, Y or Z axis

Title: deviceOrientation
Description: The system variable deviceOrientation always contains the orientation of the device

Title: deviceShaken()
Description: The deviceShaken() function is called when the device total acceleration changes of accelerationX and accelerationY values is more than the threshold value

Title: deviceTurned()
Description: The deviceTurned() function is called when the device rotates by more than 90 degrees continuously.

Title: pAccelerationX
Description: The system variable pAccelerationX always contains the acceleration of the device along the x axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: pAccelerationY
Description: The system variable pAccelerationY always contains the acceleration of the device along the y axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: pAccelerationZ
Description: The system variable pAccelerationZ always contains the acceleration of the device along the z axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: pRotationX
Description: The system variable pRotationX always contains the rotation of the device along the x axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: pRotationY
Description: The system variable pRotationY always contains the rotation of the device along the y axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: pRotationZ
Description: The system variable pRotationZ always contains the rotation of the device along the z axis in the frame previous to the current frame

Title: rotationX
Description: The system variable rotationX always contains the rotation of the device along the x axis

Title: rotationY
Description: The system variable rotationY always contains the rotation of the device along the y axis

Title: rotationZ
Description: The system variable rotationZ always contains the rotation of the device along the z axis

Title: setMoveThreshold()
Description: The setMoveThreshold() function is used to set the movement threshold for the deviceMoved() function

Title: setShakeThreshold()
Description: The setShakeThreshold() function is used to set the movement threshold for the deviceShaken() function

Title: turnAxis
Description: When a device is rotated, the axis that triggers the deviceTurned() method is stored in the turnAxis variable

Title: key
Description: A String system variable that contains the value of the last key typed.

Title: keyCode
Description: A Number system variable that contains the code of the last key typed.

Title: keyIsDown()
Description: Returns true if the key it’s checking is pressed and false if not.

Title: keyIsPressed
Description: A Boolean system variable that's true if any key is currently pressed and false if not.

Title: keyPressed()
Description: A function that's called once when any key is pressed.

Title: keyReleased()
Description: A function that's called once when any key is released.

Title: keyTyped()
Description: A function that's called once when keys with printable characters are pressed.

Title: doubleClicked()
Description: A function that's called once when a mouse button is clicked twice quickly.

Title: exitPointerLock()
Description: Exits a pointer lock started with requestPointerLock.

Title: mouseButton
Description: A String system variable that contains the value of the last mouse button pressed.

Title: mouseClicked()
Description: A function that's called once after a mouse button is pressed and released.

Title: mouseDragged()
Description: A function that's called when the mouse moves while a button is pressed.

Title: mouseIsPressed
Description: A Boolean system variable that's true if the mouse is pressed and false if not.

Title: mouseMoved()
Description: A function that's called when the mouse moves.

Title: mousePressed()
Description: A function that's called once when a mouse button is pressed.

Title: mouseReleased()
Description: A function that's called once when a mouse button is released.

Title: mouseWheel()
Description: A function that's called once when the mouse wheel moves.

Title: mouseX
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's horizontal position.

Title: mouseY
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's vertical position.

Title: movedX
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's horizontal movement.

Title: movedY
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's vertical movement.

Title: pmouseX
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's previous horizontal position.

Title: pmouseY
Description: A Number system variable that tracks the mouse's previous vertical position.

Title: pwinMouseX
Description: A Number variable that tracks the mouse's previous horizontal position within the browser.

Title: pwinMouseY
Description: A Number variable that tracks the mouse's previous vertical position within the browser.

Title: requestPointerLock()
Description: Locks the mouse pointer to its current position and makes it invisible.

Title: winMouseX
Description: A Number variable that tracks the mouse's horizontal position within the browser.

Title: winMouseY
Description: A Number variable that tracks the mouse's vertical position within the browser.

Title: touchEnded()
Description: A function that's called once each time a screen touch ends.

Title: touchMoved()
Description: A function that's called when the user touches the screen and moves.

Title: touchStarted()
Description: A function that's called once each time the user touches the screen.

Title: touches
Description: An Array of all the current touch points on a touchscreen device.

Title: changed()
Description: Calls a function when the element changes.

Title: createA()
Description: Creates an <a> element that links to another web page.

Title: createAudio()
Description: Creates a hidden <audio> element for simple audio playback.

Title: createButton()
Description: Creates a <button></button> element.

Title: createCapture()
Description: Creates a <video> element that "captures" the audio/video stream from the webcam and microphone.

Title: createCheckbox()
Description: Creates a checkbox <input></input> element.

Title: createColorPicker()
Description: Creates a color picker element.

Title: createDiv()
Description:
Creates a
element.

Title: createElement()
Description: Creates a new p5.Element object.

Title: createFileInput()
Description: Creates an <input></input> element of type 'file'.

Title: createImg()
Description: Creates an element that can appear outside of the canvas.

Title: createInput()
Description: Creates a text <input></input> element.

Title: createP()
Description: Creates a paragraph element.

Title: createRadio()
Description: Creates a radio button element.

Title: createSlider()
Description: Creates a slider <input></input> element.

Title: createSpan()
Description: Creates a element.

Title: createVideo()
Description: Creates a <video> element for simple audio/video playback.

Title: input()
Description: Calls a function when the element receives input.

Title: removeElements()
Description: Removes all elements created by p5.js, including any event handlers.

Title: select()
Description: Searches the page for the first element that matches the given CSS selector string.

Title: selectAll()
Description: Searches the page for all elements that matches the given CSS selector string.

Title: addClass()
Description: Adds a class to the element.

Title: attribute()
Description: Adds an attribute to the element.

Title: center()
Description: Centers the element either vertically, horizontally, or both.

Title: child()
Description: Attaches the element as a child of another element.

Title: class()
Description: Adds a class attribute to the element using a given string.

Title: doubleClicked()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse is pressed twice over the element.

Title: dragLeave()
Description: Calls a function when a file is dragged off the element.

Title: dragOver()
Description: Calls a function when a file is dragged over the element.

Title: draggable()
Description: Makes the element draggable.

Title: drop()
Description: Calls a function when the user drops a file on the element.

Title: elt
Description: The element's underlying HTMLElement object.

Title: hasClass()
Description: Checks if a class is already applied to element.

Title: height
Description: A Number property that stores the element's height.

Title: hide()
Description: Hides the current element.

Title: html()
Description: Sets the inner HTML of the element, replacing any existing HTML.

Title: id()
Description: Sets the element's ID using a given string.

Title: mouseClicked()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse is pressed and released over the element.

Title: mouseMoved()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse moves over the element.

Title: mouseOut()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse moves off the element.

Title: mouseOver()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse moves onto the element.

Title: mousePressed()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse is pressed over the element.

Title: mouseReleased()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse is released over the element.

Title: mouseWheel()
Description: Calls a function when the mouse wheel scrolls over the element.

Title: parent()
Description: Attaches the element to a parent element.

Title: position()
Description: Sets the element's position.

Title: remove()
Description: Removes the element, stops all audio/video streams, and removes all callback functions.

Title: removeAttribute()
Description: Removes an attribute from the element.

Title: removeClass()
Description: Removes a class from the element.

Title: show()
Description: Shows the current element.

Title: size()
Description: Sets the element's width and height.

Title: style()
Description: Applies a style to the element by adding a CSS declaration.

Title: toggleClass()
Description: Toggles whether a class is applied to the element.

Title: touchEnded()
Description: Calls a function when the user stops touching the element.

Title: touchMoved()
Description: Calls a function when the user touches the element and moves.

Title: touchStarted()
Description: Calls a function when the element is touched.

Title: value()
Description: Returns or sets the element's value.

Title: width
Description: A Number property that stores the element's width.

Title: data
Description: A string containing the file's data.

Title: file
Description: Underlying File object

Title: name
Description: The file name as a string.

Title: size
Description: The number of bytes in the file.

Title: subtype
Description: The file subtype as a string.

Title: type
Description: The file MIME type as a string.

Title: addCue()
Description: Schedules a function to call when the audio/video reaches a specific time during its playback.

Title: autoplay()
Description: Sets the audio/video to play once it's loaded.

Title: clearCues()
Description: Removes all functions scheduled with media.addCue().

Title: connect()
Description: Sends the element's audio to an output.

Title: disconnect()
Description: Disconnect all Web Audio routing, including to the main output.

Title: duration()
Description: Returns the audio/video's duration in seconds.

Title: hideControls()
Description: Hide the default HTMLMediaElement controls.

Title: loop()
Description: Plays the audio/video repeatedly in a loop.

Title: noLoop()
Description: Stops the audio/video from playing in a loop.

Title: onended()
Description: Calls a function when the audio/video reaches the end of its playback.

Title: pause()
Description: Pauses a media element.

Title: play()
Description: Plays audio or video from a media element.

Title: removeCue()
Description: Removes a callback based on its ID.

Title: showControls()
Description: Show the default HTMLMediaElement controls.

Title: speed()
Description: Sets the audio/video playback speed.

Title: src
Description: Path to the media element's source as a string.

Title: stop()
Description: Stops a media element and sets its current time to 0.

Title: time()
Description: Sets the media element's playback time.

Title: volume()
Description: Sets the audio/video volume.

Title: append()
Description: Adds a value to the end of an array

Title: arrayCopy()
Description: Copies an array (or part of an array) to another array

Title: concat()
Description: Concatenates two arrays, maps to Array.concat()

Title: reverse()
Description: Reverses the order of an array, maps to Array.reverse()

Title: shorten()
Description: Decreases an array by one element and returns the shortened array, maps to Array.pop().

Title: shuffle()
Description: Shuffles the elements of an array.

Title: sort()
Description: Sorts an array of numbers from smallest to largest, or puts an array of words in alphabetical order

Title: splice()
Description: Inserts a value or an array of values into an existing array

Title: subset()
Description: Extracts an array of elements from an existing array

Title: boolean()
Description: Converts a String or Number to a Boolean.

Title: byte()
Description: Converts a Boolean, String, or Number to its byte value.

Title: char()
Description: Converts a Number or String to a single-character String.

Title: float()
Description: Converts a String to a floating point (decimal) Number.

Title: hex()
Description: Converts a Number to a String with its hexadecimal value.

Title: int()
Description: Converts a Boolean, String, or decimal Number to an integer.

Title: str()
Description: Converts a Boolean or Number to String.

Title: unchar()
Description: Converts a single-character String to a Number.

Title: unhex()
Description: Converts a String with a hexadecimal value to a Number.

Title: createNumberDict()
Description: Creates a new instance of p5.NumberDict using the key-value pair or object you provide.

Title: createStringDict()
Description: Creates a new instance of p5.StringDict using the key-value pair or the object you provide.

Title: p5.StringDict
Description: A simple Dictionary class for Strings.

Title: clearStorage()
Description: Removes all items in the web browser's local storage.

Title: getItem()
Description: Returns a value in the web browser's local storage.

Title: removeItem()
Description: Removes an item from the web browser's local storage.

Title: storeItem()
Description: Stores a value in the web browser's local storage.

Title: join()
Description: Combines an array of strings into one string.

Title: match()
Description: Applies a regular expression to a string and returns an array with the first match.

Title: matchAll()
Description: Applies a regular expression to a string and returns an array of matches.

Title: nf()
Description: Converts a Number into a String with a given number of digits.

Title: nfc()
Description: Converts a Number into a String with commas to mark units of 1,000.

Title: nfp()
Description: Converts a Number into a String with a plus or minus sign.

Title: nfs()
Description: Converts a positive Number into a String with an extra space in front.

Title: split()
Description: Splits a String into pieces and returns an array containing the pieces.

Title: splitTokens()
Description: Splits a String into pieces and returns an array containing the pieces.

Title: trim()
Description: Removes whitespace from the start and end of a String without changing the middle.

Title: add()
Description: Add the given number to the value currently stored at the given key

Title: div()
Description: Divide the given number with the value currently stored at the given key

Title: maxKey()
Description: Return the highest key currently used in the Dictionary.

Title: maxValue()
Description: Return the highest number currently stored in the Dictionary.

Title: minKey()
Description: Return the lowest key currently used in the Dictionary.

Title: minValue()
Description: Return the lowest number currently stored in the Dictionary.

Title: mult()
Description: Multiply the given number with the value currently stored at the given key

Title: sub()
Description: Subtract the given number from the value currently stored at the given key

Title: clear()
Description: Removes all previously stored key-value pairs from the Dictionary.

Title: create()
Description: Creates a new key-value pair in the Dictionary.

Title: get()
Description: Returns the value stored at the given key.

Title: hasKey()
Description: Returns true if the given key exists in the Dictionary, otherwise returns false.

Title: print()
Description: Logs the set of items currently stored in the Dictionary to the console.

Title: remove()
Description: Removes the key-value pair stored at the given key from the Dictionary.

Title: saveJSON()
Description: Converts the Dictionary into a JSON file for local download.

Title: saveTable()
Description: Converts the Dictionary into a CSV file for local download.

Title: set()
Description: Updates the value associated with the given key in case it already exists in the Dictionary

Title: size()
Description: Returns the number of key-value pairs currently stored in the Dictionary.

Title: disableFriendlyErrors
Description: Turns off the parts of the Friendly Error System (FES) that impact performance.

Title: draw()
Description: A function that's called repeatedly while the sketch runs.

Title: isLooping()
Description: Returns true if the draw loop is running and false if not.

Title: loop()
Description: Resumes the draw loop after noLoop() has been called.

Title: noLoop()
Description: Stops the code in draw() from running repeatedly.

Title: pop()
Description: Ends a drawing group that contains its own styles and transformations.

Title: preload()
Description: A function that's called once to load assets before the sketch runs.

Title: push()
Description: Begins a drawing group that contains its own styles and transformations.

Title: redraw()
Description: Runs the code in draw() once.

Title: remove()
Description: Removes the sketch from the web page.

Title: setup()
Description: A function that's called once when the sketch begins running.

Title: AUTO
Description: AUTO allows us to automatically set the width or height of an element (but not both), based on the current height and width of the element

Title: DEGREES
Description: A String constant that's used to set the angleMode().

Title: HALF\_PI
Description: A Number constant that's approximately 1.5708.

Title: HSB
Description: HSB (hue, saturation, brightness) is a type of color model

Title: P2D
Description: The default, two-dimensional renderer.

Title: PI
Description: A Number constant that's approximately 3.1416.

Title: QUARTER\_PI
Description: A Number constant that's approximately 0.7854.

Title: RADIANS
Description: A String constant that's used to set the angleMode().

Title: TAU
Description: A Number constant that's approximately 6.2382.

Title: TWO\_PI
Description: A Number constant that's approximately 6.2382.

Title: VERSION
Description: Version of this p5.js.

Title: WEBGL
Description: One of the two render modes in p5.js, used for computationally intensive tasks like 3D rendering and shaders.

Title: WEBGL2
Description: One of the two possible values of a WebGL canvas (either WEBGL or WEBGL2), which can be used to determine what capabilities the rendering environment has.

Title: class
Description: A template for creating objects of a particular type.

Title: console
Description: Prints a message to the web browser's console.

Title: for
Description: A way to repeat a block of code when the number of iterations is known.

Title: function
Description: A named group of statements.

Title: if
Description: A way to choose whether to run a block of code.

Title: let
Description: Declares a new variable.

Title: Array
Description: A list that keeps several pieces of data in order.

Title: Boolean
Description: A value that's either true or false.

Title: Number
Description: A number that can be positive, negative, or zero.

Title: Object
Description: A container for data that's stored as key-value pairs.

Title: String
Description: A sequence of text characters.

Title: while
Description: A way to repeat a block of code.
